definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Lucilla:For now. first thing I shall do is have a hot bath.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我唯一想做的就是洗個熱水澡。

sentences.english: And you'd rather spend an extra ten minutes in a hot shower than go out for a morning job.
sentences.chinese: 相信你寧願多花十分鐘衝熱水澡也懶得出門工作。

sentences.english: Anger is a hot bath that scalds and makes you scream.
sentences.chinese: 生氣是洗熱水澡被燙傷發出的尖叫。

sentences.english: Listen to some soft music. Drink a glass of wine.
sentences.chinese: 泡個舒服的熱水澡，聽一些輕柔的音樂，喝杯葡萄酒。

sentences.english: He husked himself and took a hot shower.
sentences.chinese: 他脫光衣服，洗了一個熱水澡。

sentences.english: But after a hot shower, it looks larger.
sentences.chinese: 但是，經過一個熱水澡，它看起來變大了。

sentences.english: Establish a pre-sleep ritual such as a warm bath or a few minutes of reading.
sentences.chinese: 建立預先睡眠儀式，如洗個熱水澡或閱讀幾分鐘。

sentences.english: A warm bath will calm you down.
sentences.chinese: 洗個熱水澡會使你平靜下來。

sentences.english: Also, a hot shower can be one of the most soothing experiences early in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，在早晨一個熱水澡是最寬慰的體驗。

sentences.english: Mary loves having a hot shower after she's been swimming.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗喜歡游泳後衝個熱水澡。
要枕柔軟的枕頭，洗熱水澡？

sentences.english: At this hotel, a hot bath is an extra.
sentences.chinese: 在這個旅館裏，洗熱水澡要另收費。

sentences.english: A long hot bath can be pure luxury .
sentences.chinese: 洗個痛快的熱水澡可真是一種至高的享受。

sentences.english: I like to take a hot bath every night before going to bed.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡在每天晚上睡覺前洗個熱水澡。

sentences.english: After long journey, we wish once red-hot water bath.
sentences.chinese: 經過長途跋涉，大家恨不得立刻衝個熱水澡。

sentences.english: Try taking nice hot bath with Epsom salts to help relieve some of your back pain.
sentences.chinese: 試試用瀉鹽好好洗個熱水澡，對減輕背痛很有效的哦。
